name: Body Glide Skin Glide Anti-Chafe Cream 45g
description: Trusted by athletes for more than 2 decades, Body Glide has become the go-to name in anti-chafing solutions. The Skin Glide Anti-Chafe cream is easy to get in hard to reach places, like between toes and works anywhere hot-spots, blisters, or chafing are an issue.Applies like a cream and quickly dries into a protective, lubricating barrier.Hypoallergenic and has no animal by-products or been tested on animals. Vegan approved.Offers all-day Protection and is wetsuit, clothing, and footwear safe.Skin Glide uses a unique set of ingredients: aqua (water, eau), maranta arundinacea root powder, cocos nucifera (coconut) oil, glycerin, glyceryl stearate, cetyl alcohol, kaolin, isopropyl myristate, eucalyptus globulus leaf oil, menthol, triethanolamine, melaleuca alternifolia (tea tree) leaf oil, mentha piperita (peppermint) oil, stearic acid, phenoxyethanol, carbomer, allantoin, xanthan gum.
